{'list': 'Backlog', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:01', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f034', 'name': 'Create Landing Page', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/czyYetdE/8-create-landing-page', 'desc': '- _Description:_ Plan and design the landing page for our website. - _Requirements:_
  - Highlight key features and benefits on the landing page.

{'list': 'Backlog', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:01', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f02d', 'name': 'Design Logo and Branding', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/uUBmhJIw/4-design-logo-and-branding', 'desc': "- _Description:_ Create a unique and attractive logo for our startup. Develop a branding guideline.
- _Requirements:_

  - Create a branding guideline with color schemes and typography.", 'dateLastActivity': '2023-11-06T10:29:08.531Z', 'labels': ['Design', 'UX/UI'], 'members': []}}

{'list': 'Backlog', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:01', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f044', 'name': 'Market Research for Merch', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/ar96jSzX/16-market-research-for-merch', 'desc': '- _Description:_ Conduct market research to identify potential merch products and their demand.

{'list': 'Backlog', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:01', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f036', 'name': 'Set Up Social Media Accounts', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/SksaVEpH/9-set-up-social-media-accounts', 'desc': '- _Description:_ Create and configure social media profiles for our startup. {'list': 'Sprint Backlog', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:01', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f02b', 'name': 'Develop Mobile App Login', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/UYdn6qNR/3-develop-mobile-app-login', 'desc': '- Description: Implement the login functionality for the mobile app using Firebase authentication.

  - Integrate Firebase authentication for user login.
  - Implement secure password handling.', 'dateLastActivity': '2023-11-06T10:31:08.729Z', 'labels': ['Development', 'Security'], 'members': ['634c09848c64b000dfc21638']}}

{'list': 'Sprint Backlog', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:01', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f03c', 'name': 'Website Content Writing', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/arcsn2zr/12-website-content-writing', 'desc': '- _Description:_ Write engaging and informative content for the startup's website, including about us and product pages.
- _Requirements:_
  - Write clear and compelling content for the "About Us" and "Product" pages.
  - Ensure SEO optimization for all content.', 'dateLastActivity': '2023-11-06T10:31:59.407Z', 'labels': ['Content', 'SEO'], 'members': []}}

{'list': 'In Progress', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:01', 'content': {'id': '6548c14bc12c552f411e2916', 'name': 'Merch Supplier Negociations', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/wcgEwMeZ/2-merch-supplier-negociations', 'desc': '- _Description:_ Initiate discussions with potential merch suppliers regarding pricing and product details.

{'list': '01/11/23 Sprint - Complete', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:02', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f023', 'name': 'Mobile App Alpha Version', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/ws7xkzWt/5-mobile-app-alpha-version', 'desc': '- _Description:_ Complete the alpha version of the mobile app. Basic functionality and UI elements are ready for testing.

{'list': '01/11/23 Sprint - Complete', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:02', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f042', 'name': 'Website Homepage', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/1hn0SL6H/15-website-homepage', 'desc': '- _Description:_ The homepage of the website is complete, including the header, footer, and content sections.

{'list': '01/11/23 Sprint - Complete', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:02', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f030', 'name': 'Merch supplier chosen', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/44j4RriV/6-merch-supplier-chosen', 'desc': '- Description: Select a merch supplier based on negotiations and compatibility with our needs.

{'list': '01/11/23 Sprint - Complete', 'last_updated': '06/11/2023 11:45:02', 'content': {'id': '653f75b393231589d830f032', 'name': '(1) Decouple board page list CSS', 'url': 'https://trello.com/c/q6TCak4r/7-1-decouple-board-page-list-css', 'desc': '`bobby/boards-page-css`

-----

Refactors the boards page markup. There are only two user facing changes:

- The team boards page should be four columns wide instead of three on large screens.
- The home boards page will not have the gutter. The header will be flush with the boards.

Will need testing cross browser.', 'dateLastActivity': '2023-10-30T09:21:56.692Z', 'labels': ['Verified on staging'], 'members': []}}

- The home boards page will not have the gutter. The header will be flush with the boards.
